recipe_name: Fresh asparagus and beef tomato salad with herb oil dressing
author: Alex Mackay
method: Bring a pan of salted water to the boil, add the asparagus and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until just tender, then drain. Blend the chervil, olive oil, salt and freshly ground black pepper in a food processor until smooth. To serve, place the beef tomato slices onto a serving plate and place the boiled asparagus on top of them. Pour the dressing over the top.
ingredients: small bunch asparagus, trimmed,  large bunch fresh chervil,  75ml/2½fl oz olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  ½ beef tomato, sliced
